name: Purifying Emblem
description: Seraph will remove half of any [buff] and [debuff] effect stacks.

additionalTooltips.title: Buff
additionalTooltips.description: Buff effects are generally positive for their target and are represented by green icons.

additionalTooltips.title: Debuff
additionalTooltips.description: Debuff effects are generally negative for their target and are represented by red icons.
